OOC: Try to guess who they are everybody, from the first letters of their n=
ames.....(Legendarynemasis and Yanshosh, you guys know, so don't tell!)
::N=
/HD::

     A bat hovered in the air with his wings, and along side him, a =
black, armoured-cyborg horse, their shadows seemed to loom over the CF.

  =
   "Bro, we made it back.  It seems so long.  I'm glad we defeated that cre=
ep.....I think...." HD said to her brother N.

     "Yes, we have made it b=
ack to the Cybertronian Fire, sister.  Shall we see how the world has chang=
ed since we were gone from civilization?" N suggested.

      HD nodded her=
 head.  They both continued getting closer to the CF.  They both transforme=
d to robot mode.
